name: Anti-Creator, Hatred Inundate
description:
The core of the ancient "Scepter," the materialized "hatred" of Amphoreus. It has recorded billions of souls' suffering, countless lambs' blood converging into an absolute darkness. The endless, infinite darkness flows out from a broken shell, driving forth the headless giant.
This shell, forged from an endless stream of "hatred," seems to contain a heart wrapped in chaotic flames deep within.

skills.name: Cast Down Blood and Scar
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to one designated target.

skills.name: Weave Suffering and Death
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Yield Not to Tyranny
skills.description: Deals Quantum DMG to locked-on target and reduce their Energy.

skills.name: Mire Not Within Caves
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to the locked-on target and inflicts the "<u>Action Lock</u>" state.

skills.name: The Crown of Divinity Shall Shatter
skills.description: Deals massive Quantum DMG to all targets and reduces all targets' Energy.

skills.name: The Spirit's Prison Shall Burn
skills.description: Deals massive Imaginary DMG and inflicts the "<u>Action Lock</u>" state to the locked-on target.

skills.name: Resist and Destroy
skills.description: Enters the "Resist and Destroy" state, fully restores HP for "Mythos" and "Logos," cannot be attacked before the next action, and uses "Immolate the Heavens, Abandon the World" on all targets during the next action. The "Resist and Destroy" state can be dispelled when all "Mythos" and "Logos" enter "Grave Wound" state.

skills.name: Immolate the Heavens, Abandon the World
skills.description: Deals massive Physical DMG to all targets. If "Mythos" is not in the "Grave Wound" state, randomly inflict the "<u>Action Lock</u>" state on one target character. If "Logos" is not in the "Grave Wound" state, reduces Energy for all targets.

skills.name: Amphorean Hatred
skills.description: Attack abilities of "Anti-Creator," "Mythos," or "Logos" increases "Amphorean Hatred." When "Hatred" increases, "Irontomb" uses "The Fall of Erudition," reducing the targets' Maximum Restorable HP and Maximum Recoverable Skill Points. This effect is weakened when "Hatred" decreases. When "Hatred" reaches its maximum, immediately uses "Ashes of All Begets Genesis." The fewer ally characters on the field, the less "Amphorean Hatred" increases.

skills.name: Thirty Million Cycles of Sin
skills.description: When "Mythos" and "Logos" receive DMG, "Anti-Creator" will also receive DMG. "Anti-Creator," "Mythos," and "Logos" initially receive reduced DMG. Each time "Mythos" and "Logos" enter the "Grave Wound" state, this DMG Reduction effect is weakened. When both enter "Grave Wound" state simultaneously, this effect is removed.

skills.name: Ashes of All Begets Genesis
skills.description: When "Amphorean Hatred" reaches its max, combat ends in failure.
